decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 08.00 to 18.00 on Mondays to Friday and 08.00 to 13.00 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and public holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - That upon commencement of use of the new changing room facilities, the pavilion be demolished within six months of that date, and the land on which it stood be grassed over and maintained as such.

Condition : 5 - That the playing fields not be used after 30 minutes before lighting-up time, and that the sports hall not be used after 21.00, and that the changing room facilities not be used after whichever is the later of the two times, on any night of the week.

Condition : 6 - That the parking facilities provided on the school grounds be made available for parking during all times the sports facilities (indoor and outdoor) are being used out of school hours.

Condition : 7 - That details of after-hours pedestrian access to and through the site, and a plan of security for the school buildings, be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing before any development commences.

Condition : 8 - Before the development commences details of bicycle parking for after-hours users of the site shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The spaces shown on the approved plan shall be made available for use before first occupation of the development.
Condition : 9 - All waste, including materials to be burned, shall be removed and disposed of off site.
Condition : 10 - There shall be no external floodlighting of the playing fields without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Demolition of existing changing rooms and the erection of a new sports hall and changing rooms to existing site.
